oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Jesse Washington Carmack, Co. F, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Jesse Washington Carmack, Co. F (formerly D), 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Carmack left Livingston in May 1861 and travelled to Nashville with his regiment. He was present at the Battles of Corinth, Miss., Perryville, Ky., Murfreesboro, Tenn." Chickamauga, Geo., Franklin and Nashville, Tenn. He deserted the Confederate Army of Dec. 20, 1864 and took the oath of allegiance on Feb. 14, 1865 at Burkesville, Ky.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carmack, Jesse Washington
